oldCode

Class AddressBookData

  • java.lang.Object
    • oldCode.AddressBookData

  • public class AddressBookData
extends java.lang.Object
    This version uses an AddressBookDataSource and its methods to retrieve data

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AddressBookData(UserDataSource dataSource)
      Constructor initializes the list model that holds names as Strings and attempts to read any data saved from previous invocations of the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a person to the address book.

      Retrieves Person details from the model.

      Accessor for the list model.
      int getSize() 
      void persist()
      Saves the data in the address book using a persistence mechanism.
      void remove(java.lang.Object key)
      Based on the name of the person in the address book, delete the person.
